property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: U.S. and Pakistani officials at a meeting

note.text: Allow your counterpart to lead the conversation and respond accordingly with your own input. Resist a "checklist" approach, where you attempt cover a list of topics. Take a calm, deliberate approach and prioritize topics you'd like to address. If you run out of time, leave remaining topics for the next engagement.
Remember, you are building a working relationship and each effective meeting is an opportunity for re-engagement.
